attributes.action: do all in his power to ensure that Tony Blair does not become President of the EU.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It appears that Tony Blair is one of the favourites to become President of the EU which is a new post created by the soon to be ratified Lisbon Treaty.This would be anathema to large sections of the British people and very divisive.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
